game.name: Retronaut
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Steam 순위표, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A rogue star pilot lost between galaxies—upgrade your ship, harness ancient artifacts, and survive relentless alien hordes in this cosmic action roguelite.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A rogue star pilot lost between galaxies—upgrade your ship, harness ancient artifacts, and survive relentless alien hordes in this cosmic action roguelite.
